description.value:
Access Sparklers are common in Tian Xia and Vudra and can be Crafted by those who can specifically Craft fireworks.

Activate 1 (manipulate)

A sparkler gives off colorful sparks, burning for 1 minute. It provides bright light in a 10-foot radius (and dim light for the next 10 feet). While the sparkler burns, you can use it as an improvised weapon, dealing @Damage[1[fire]] on a hit. On a critical hit, you cause the target to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 round.

You can touch a sparkler to a flammable object as part of the action you spend Activating it or as a separate Interact action while the sparkler is already activated. If you do so, the sparkler can ignite flammable objects the way a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Matchstick] does.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Sparkler]
